name: Justbaat
author: Justbaat

sections.description:
Refresh Ad slots on your website to enhance viewability and engagement

Third-Party Services

Justbaat plugin relies on a third-party service to enhance its functionality. This service is integral to providing the best possible user experience and ensuring the smooth operation of the plugin.

Use of Third-Party Services
External Service Dependency
This plugin utilizes a third-party script hosted at JustBaat. The script is essential for the plugin to refresh data and improve performance.

Data Transmission
When using Justbaat plugin, the plugin may send and receive data from the JustBaat service. This data transmission is necessary for the plugin to function correctly and provide real-time updates.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

The Justbaat plugin does not collect any personal user data from your WordPress site. However, it utilizes a third-party script hosted at JustBaat ([https://mcm.justbaat.org/scripts/jb-refresher.v1.min.js]) for data refresh and improved performance. We recommend reviewing JustBaat’s privacy policy for details on data handling practices related to this script: [https://mcm.justbaat.org/docs/ad-refresher/privacy-policy.html].

For information regarding the terms of use for the Justbaat plugin, please refer to our website’s terms and conditions page: [https://mcm.justbaat.org/docs/ad-refresher/terms-and-conditions.html].

-** Service Url ** –
– [https://mcm.justbaat.org/scripts/jb-refresher.v1.min.js]
sections.faq:
What is the purpose of this plugin?

This plugin simplifies the integration and management of different advertisement types on WordPress sites, enhancing content monetization through easy-to-manage ad placements.= What is the purpose of this plugin? =

This plugin simplifies the integration and management of different advertisement types on WordPress sites, enhancing content monetization through easy-to-manage ad placements.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release with features such as popup ad, rewarded ad.

short_description: Boost your site with versatile ads: pop-ups, video, and more, seamlessly integrated via Justbaat Ads.
